mapper.insert: insert into mg_color_group (group_id, group_name, part_id, insert_time, insert_by) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insertBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select group_id, group_name, part_id, insert_time, insert_by from mg_color_group
